archimate:Deliverable.name: ServiceNow CMDB blueprint updated to reflect the needs to Vulnerability Management
archimate:Deliverable.documentation:
CMDB/Asset database must be updated to reflect the needs of vulnerability management. There are lot's of new fields required where vulnerability data, classifications etc. are stored. This is most propably realized on data management area. Also how to identify which assets are in scope and which are not? Asset relationships must be also be accurate in order to identify vulnerabilities which are running within the asset.
https://www.servicenow.com/content/dam/servicenow-assets/public/en-us/doc-type/success/quick-answer/cmdb-impact-vulnerability-response.pdf
